author: Simon Difford
description: Tea tannins and lemon juice dry and sour this cognac and rum-laced punch with rich peach liqueur balancing and adding fruit appeal.
name: Fish House Punch
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
30 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
